title: US tariff threats over Greenland pose 'more political than economic' consequences for Europe
subhead: From January to November 2025, European exports to the US increased by 2%, despite the tariffs implemented by the Trump administration. The impact, however, was more severe in certain subsectors, including wine.

title: Macron denounces US competition seeking to 'subordinate Europe'
French PM forces part of 2026 budget through Parliament without a vote
Israeli hostages in Gaza recount sexual violence during their captivity
subhead: Over the past two years, several people held captive by Hamas and other organizations have reported suffering sexual violence in addition to deprivation, beatings, humiliation and threats.

title: Venezuela says it has received $300 million from US oil sale used to prop up currency
subhead: Delcy Rodriguez said the sum from a $500 million sale conducted by Washington would be used to 'stabilize' the foreign exchange market. Before the US capture of longtime leader Nicolas Maduro on January 3, Venezuela had been forced to offer huge discounts on its crude to circumvent the US oil embargo.

title: PSG's bid for top eight finish jeopardized after Lisbon loss
subhead: Despite being largely dominant, Paris Saint-Germain struggled to create genuine chances, their combinations around the penalty area proving too weak and predictable for the Lisbon defense. 'The result is disappointing and unfair,' said coach Luis Enrique of the 2-1 defeat.

title: Bastien François, political scientist: 'There are good and bad ways to use Article 49.3' of the French Constitution
subhead: French Prime Minister Sébastien Lecornu's decision to ram the budget through Parliament without a vote, using Article 49.3 of the Constitution, is not undemocratic, explains political science professor Bastien François.

In one year, Trump has imposed a culture of impunity
subhead: Since returning to the White House, the American president has exempted himself from all rules, both domestically and internationally. This sense of impunity now permeates his entire administration.

title: Trump isolated after trade escalation with Europe over Greenland
subhead: The president's threats could undermine the agreement reached by the United States and the European Union in the summer of 2025.

title: Yann Le Cun: 'Why I'm leaving Meta to launch my own AI start-up'
subhead: The former head of artificial intelligence research at Meta explains his decision to start a new company focused on the physical world, citing strategic differences with the American tech giant and predicting a 'third AI revolution' in the coming years.
